settings.subheading: Bringing Innovation and Timeless Lighting Design to the Middle East
settings.title: lights&lamps: Exclusively at Loom Collection
settings.text:
Loom Collection is proud to be the exclusive stockist of lights&lamps in the Middle East, connecting you to one of the UK’s most celebrated lighting brands. Founded by renowned designers Niki Wright and Scarlett Hampton, lights&lamps redefines modern lighting with its innovative, design-led collections and meticulous craftsmanship.

Every piece is a testament to their 25+ years of lighting expertise, blending timeless aesthetics with superior quality. By partnering exclusively with lights&lamps, Loom Collection brings their unparalleled designs and inspiring creations to your home.

Explore the artistry, precision, and passion behind lights&lamps—now available exclusively at Loom Collection.
